trans-unit.source: Represents the center panel of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> 控制項的中央面板。

trans-unit.source: You can use the top, bottom, left, and right panels of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> to hold <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用上方、 底部、 左邊與右邊的面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>來保存<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel> to hold controls other than these.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>來保存這些以外的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates adding a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: The edges of the container to which a control is bound and determines how a control is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: 控制項所繫結至、且決定控制項如何隨其父代調整大小之容器的邊緣。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enable automatic scrolling; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用自動捲動，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: The distance between any child controls and the edges of the scrollable parent control.
trans-unit.target: 任何子控制項和可捲動父控制項邊緣之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: The minimum size of the auto-scroll.
trans-unit.target: 自動捲動大小的最小值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enable automatic sizing; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用自動調整大小，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The mode by which the content panel automatically resizes itself.
trans-unit.target: 內容面板自動調整本身大小所根據的模式。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Overridden to ensure that the background color of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> reflects the background color of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫以確保 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> 的背景色彩會反映 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" /> 的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure representing the background color of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" /> 的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control causes validation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項引發驗證，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the content panel loads.
trans-unit.target: 發生於內容面板載入時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.Load> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.Load>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel> named `ToolStripContentPanel1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>名為`ToolStripContentPanel1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.Load> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.Load>事件。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates of the upper-left corner of the control relative to the upper-left corner of its container.
trans-unit.target: 控制項左上角相對於其容器之左上角的座標。

trans-unit.target: GetPreferredSize 所能指定之上限的大小。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnLoad%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnLoad%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnLoad(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnLoad(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnLoad(System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnLoad(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Renders the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 呈現 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: This method calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanelRenderEventArgs>, which contains all the information necessary to render the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanelRenderEventArgs>，其中包含呈現所需的所有資訊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnPaintBackground%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnPaintBackground%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnPaintBackground(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnPaintBackground(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnPaintBackground(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnPaintBackground(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.RendererChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.RendererChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnRendererChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnRendererChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnRendererChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnRendererChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnRendererChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnRendererChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" /> used to customize the appearance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" />，用來自訂 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" /> 的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" /> that handles painting.
trans-unit.target: 處理繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.Renderer" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.Renderer" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderMode" /> 值。
